p: Various other viruses have also been identified in farm animals and a new taxa of RNA viruses harbored in the gastrointestinal tracts were found to be related to Tombusviridae and Flaviviridae have been classified. Statoviruses (stool-associated Tombus-like viruses) is one such virus and have diverse range of mammal hosts from humans to bovine ( Janowski et al., 2017).
